data.title: G-Accelerator Beneficiaries: Doppler & Herz Project
data.meta_description: Alex, originally a physicist turned entrepreneur, presents his new project in which he is developing a piece of innovative technology, allowing for secure, reliable and privacy-friendly detection with echo waves.
data.text:
Meet Alejandro Turpin - another young, bright entrepreneur, living and working in Barcelona whilst taking part in our G-Accelerator training program.

Alex has built a successful career as a physicist, but lately wanted to transition from science into the world of business to found his own venture. He decided to join our incubator aiming to gain extensive business acumen, expand his professional network, and boost his entrepreneurial skills â€“ all in order to succeed with the launch of his social enterprise, as he takes his start-up to the actual market.

Watch his full interview to find out more about Alex's highly technical, innovative "Doppler & Hertz" project, the details about the training process so far, and his career development plans for the nearest future.
